entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Oxford House

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon then 30 percent chance of rain showers early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 11. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Monday 1 May 2023
